name: pmcomponents
description: Web components for the Privacy Manager

scripts.test: npm run build && (http-server dist -p 3001 & mocha components/tests/puppeteer/*/*.js)
scripts.start:backup: npm run smoke && http-server dist -p 3000 & watch 'npm run smoke' ./components
scripts.start: npm run clean && webpack --config webpack.config.js --smoke --watch & http-server dist -p 3000

author: Manvel Saroyan
